title: Personal Portfolio
text:
Altyn Baigaliyeva


MSc in Applied Business Analytics | Project Administrator | Data Enthusiast




 About


Welcome! I’m currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University.


My background spans civil engineering, academic support, and project administration across energy, education, and tech sectors.


With over 10 years of professional experience, I’ve worked on large-scale engineering projects, supported academic programs at Nazarbayev University, and most recently led digital transformation efforts in Kazakhstan’s oil & gas and IT industries.


I’m passionate about leveraging analytics and process improvement for impact-driven results — and believe in lifelong learning, curiosity, and collaboration.


Status: ❤️ In a relationship




 Education



Boston University — MSc in Applied Business Analytics, Expected May 2026


Kazakh National Technical University — BSc in Civil Engineering, Sep 2008 – May 2012 Chevron Scholarship Recipient (2010–2012)





 Work Experience


Solidcore Resources — Astana, Kazakhstan
Project Administrator | May 2023 – Sep 2024



Managed communications and project schedules between stakeholders and PMO


Supported business process improvement and monitored contractor deliverables



Noventiq — Astana, Kazakhstan
Project Administrator | Dec 2021 – Apr 2023



Led IT infrastructure projects (KazMunaiGaz) using Microsoft solutions


Managed Power BI implementation for KazMinerals



Nazarbayev University — Astana
Graduate Teaching Assistant | Dec 2016 – Dec 2021



Supported MSc/PhD admissions and taught Engineering Management labs


Provided academic assistance and coordinated tutorials



Tengizchevroil (Chevron’s Business Unit) — Tengiz, Kazakhstan
Engineering Construction Manager | Jun 2012 – Dec 2016



Managed $11MM capital project at KTL Plant


Ensured compliance, team coordination, and risk management





 Skills & Technologies



Analytics: SQL, R, Python, Power BI, Tableau


Project Tools: MS Project, Excel, Word


Languages: English, Russian, Kazakh


Creative: GIMP, Product Image Design


Other: Inventory and eCommerce management (eBay, Amazon, Etsy)





 Community



Volunteer, PMI Kazakhstan Chapter (Since 2019)
